definitions.text: the act of making something different (as e.g. the size of a garment)
slightly modified copy; not an exact copy
examples: a modification of last year's model

definitions.text: the grammatical relation that exists when a word qualifies the meaning of the phrase
an event that occurs when something passes from one state or phase to another
examples: the change was intended to increase sales
this storm is certainly a change for the worse
the neighborhood had undergone few modifications since his last visit years ago
